name: Storm Spirit
description: The Storm Spirit embodies lightning and thunder, navigating through narrow spaces effortlessly and dealing damage to those who approach.
memorable: Its ability to deal area damage and control the battlefield makes it a formidable opponent despite its frailty.
goals: Serves as a threat or potential asset in stormy environments.
relations: Often related to other elemental beings due to its Auran language.
environment: Commonly found in stormy or tempestuous areas.
strengths: Immunity to lightning and thunder damage; ability to move through small spaces.
weaknesses: Low hit points and inability to move on the ground.
attacks: Utilizes Thunder Slam for close combat and Shocking Bolt for ranged attacks, both dealing thunder or lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest creates a dangerous area effect, throwing enemies and dealing significant damage.
additional_information: Immune to exhaustion and several conditions.
Can hover and fly, avoiding ground-based movement restrictions.
Can deal damage to creatures in close proximity.
The Storm Form ability allows for evasive maneuvers.
Weak melee capabilities due to zero ground speed.
test_queries: elemental creature that hovers and deals thunder damage
lightning spirit found in stormy environments
medium elemental that uses tempest ability
dangerous storm spirit with area damage
